description:
Switcheo is being swapped to (SWTH) For more information on this token swap, please see the official blog post. https://medium.com/switcheo/swh-swth-token-swap-39342759c18

Switcheo is a Decentralized Exchange (DEX) built on the NEO platform. It allows for the trustless exchange of NEP-5 tokens and may expand to other cross-chain tokens in the future. Switcheo lets you trade any NEP-5 token with NEO and GAS immediately.

Instant Trading and Withdrawals
At Switcheo, you can trade directly from your wallet file. No more worrying about deposit times and hidden fees!

Low Trading Fees, No Withdrawal Fees!
Switcheo Exchange will be charging 0.1% trading fees during our promotional launch. There will be no withdrawal fees since trading is done directly from your wallet!

Trade all NEP-5 Tokens
With Switcheo’s Dynamic Call function, new NEP-5 tokens become available to trade as soon as ICO ends. This lets you trade your tokens on demand!

To check your SWTH wallet balance, follow the steps below:
1. Open NEON ( Download here: http://bit.ly/2vvq4tY )
2. Click on ‘Manage NEON settings ‘
3. Click on ‘Manage Tokens’
4. Click on ‘Add a new token’ and enter the hash for SWTH:
  ab38352559b8b203bde5fddfa0b07d8b2525e132
5. Tokens will now be viewable, and transferable via ‘send’ and selecting SWTH under ‘asset’
name: Switcheo
